name: Pragati Jubak Sangha

address: Chandbali block road, Chanbdali, Bhadrak, Pin-756133

briefDescription: (PJS) as a pro-poor, non-profit making organization has been relentlessly working with a vision of facilitating a society where the poor, deprived, under-privileged and the marginalized people and communities are able to lead a self-reliant and dignified life in a transparent, gender sensitive, accountable and democratic societal environment.We are implementing Inclusive School WASH programme  for ensure water sanitation and hygiene facilities in schools. Implementing Child line sub-center for the care and protection of children with difficult circumstances. Through which we have reached with 20 thousand children one thousand teachers,one thousand SMC members.

address: At: Dolamandop, Po: Sukleswore, Via-Chanbdali, Dist-Bhadrak
